Route Summary:

Starting in Lexington we head out to Bedford, stop at Great Meadows in Concord, then head out to DeCordova Sculpture Park and down to the Weston Green.

The route
http://tinyurl.com/97d4qg6

Riders should plan to meet at 8:45 am and be ready to ride around 9:00am

We should return to the Depot  area around 1:30 pm if we can keep the 12 to 15 pace. Please be able to b/c the group needs to return on time to the parking area.


Starting point
Depot Square, Lexington MA

Stopping points

Great Meadows National Wildlife Refuge

DeCordova Sculpture Park (free to bicyclists)

There is all day parking lot at the depot btw.


What's required
------------------------------------
Bike helmets and road bikes / skinny tire hybrids in good repair
minimum 2-3 full water bottles (cold!).
bring snacks


What's recommended:
------------------------------------
Spare tire, repair kit, sun screen, snacks, energy bars, rain gear, an extra layer, a bike lock, and a cell phone.
